destinations.name: Amalfi Coast
destinations.description: Cliffside villages, lemon groves, and azure coves along the Italian Riviera.
highlights: Sunset aperitivo cruise from Positano
Private pasta workshop in Ravello
Hike the Path of the Gods
destinations.climate: Sunny seaside weather; bring breathable linens.

destinations.name: Japan Archipelago
destinations.description: Bullet trains between neon wards, cedar forests, and coastal onsen towns.
highlights: Night ramen crawl across Tokyo neighborhoods
Lantern-lit stroll through Nara's temple district
Soak in a volcanic onsen with mountain views
destinations.climate: Humid summers, crisp winters; layer kimonos with light jackets.

destinations.name: Norwegian Fjords
destinations.description: Glacier-carved fjords, Arctic rail journeys, and design-forward harbor cities.
highlights: Cruise beneath Geirangerfjord waterfalls
Ride the Flåm Railway through alpine valleys
Aurora chase above Tromsø with Sami guides
destinations.climate: Cool maritime air; pack waterproof shells and insulation layers.

destinations.name: Brazil Rainforest & Coast
destinations.description: Amazon canopy lodges, samba-lined beaches, and cerrado wildlife corridors.
highlights: Sunrise canoe in the Amazon
Cable car to Sugarloaf Mountain
Lençóis Maranhenses dune lagoons flyover
destinations.climate: Tropical humidity with afternoon storms; quick-dry gear essential.

destinations.name: Maldives Atolls
destinations.description: Coral-ringed lagoons with seaplane hops, reef dives, and villa hammocks over clear water.
highlights: Dawn manta ray snorkel
Sandbank picnic with private chef
Bioluminescent shore walk
destinations.climate: Equatorial warmth and high UV; plan around short monsoon bursts.

destinations.name: Morocco Desert Circuit
destinations.description: Kasbah rooftops, Atlas passes, and Sahara dunes stitched together by caravan towns.
highlights: Sunrise camel trek across Erg Chebbi
Spice market tasting trail through Marrakech medina
Berber music supper in a desert camp
destinations.climate: Dry daylight heat with sharp night cool-downs; layer breathable fabrics.

destinations.name: Costa Rica Cloud Forests
destinations.description: Cloud-forest suspension bridges, surf towns, and wildlife corridors linking two coasts.
highlights: Night walk in Monteverde canopy
Thermal soak beneath Arenal volcano
Howler monkey sunrise paddle in Tortuguero
destinations.climate: Tropical humidity with quick showers; waterproof layers essential.

destinations.name: Nepal Himalayan Traverse
destinations.description: Prayer-flag valleys, tea houses, and high passes along the Himalayan spine.
highlights: Sunrise flight past Everest massif
Multi-day trek through Annapurna villages
Meditation workshop at a Kathmandu monastery
destinations.climate: Thin alpine air with chilly nights; pack insulating layers.

destinations.name: Singapore Urban Canopy
destinations.description: Sky-park gardens, hawker culture, and waterfront night walks in a compact city-state.
highlights: Progressive hawker tasting crawl in Tiong Bahru
Gardens by the Bay skywalk at dusk
Kampong Glam design studio visits
destinations.climate: Equatorial heat with frequent rain; schedule midday indoor breaks.

destinations.name: Lapland Aurora Circuit
destinations.description: Snow-laden forests, sauna rituals, and aurora camps above the Arctic Circle.
highlights: Dog-sled expedition through boreal forest
Glass igloo night beneath northern lights
Smoke sauna and ice plunge in Inari
destinations.climate: Subarctic cold with limited daylight; pack thermal layers.

featuredJourneys.title: Slow Travel Japan
featuredJourneys.description: Blend neon nights with island art gems, forest bathing, and long-table dining with chefs.

featuredJourneys.title: Andean Peaks & Plateaus
featuredJourneys.description: Taste Peruvian terroir, meet master artisans, and summit ancient citadels at sunrise.

featuredJourneys.title: Mediterranean Meander
featuredJourneys.description: Sail from seaside trattorias to citrus farms, with guided coastal hikes in between.

travelTips.title: Build buffer time on arrival
travelTips.body: Schedule an easy first day so your body can adjust to jet lag and unexpected delays.

travelTips.title: Mix cash with fee-free cards
travelTips.body: Keep a small stash of local currency for markets, but lean on a travel debit card that refunds ATM fees.

travelTips.title: Pack for microclimates
travelTips.body: Quick-dry layers, compact rain shells, and a travel-sized humidifier help adapt to humidity swings.

travelTips.title: Save offline documents
travelTips.body: Download passport scans, insurance certificates, and transit passes to your phone for low-connectivity moments.

travelTips.title: Book community-led tours
travelTips.body: Hiring local guides keeps money in neighborhoods and deepens your storytelling encounters.
